source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a cityscape scenery shot capturing a spacious public square under a dramatic, cloud-filled sky. The video lacks a single main subject, as the wide-angle perspective and camera movement emphasize the expansive atmosphere and architectural features of the location rather than any particular individual or object. At the heart of the reddish-brown tiled plaza stands a tall, slender white monument with an ornate, golden, traditional-style top, surrounded by a decorative pool, benches, and green trees, including a prominent palm tree.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video is a cityscape scenery shot capturing a spacious public square under a dramatic, cloud-filled sky. The video lacks a single main subject, as the wide-angle perspective and camera movement emphasize the expansive atmosphere and architectural features of the location rather than any particular individual or object. At the heart of the reddish-brown tiled plaza stands a tall, slender white monument with an ornate, golden, traditional-style top, surrounded by a decorative pool, benches, and green trees, including a prominent palm tree.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly states that the video lacks a focus on any particular individual, which is inaccurate. It completely omits the salient human subjects present in the scene. A young boy in a blue shirt is clearly visible running across the plaza, and later, a few people are seen sitting on motorcycles. These subjects should be included in the description. The explanation for why the video is a scenery shot is also unnecessary and makes the caption less concise. The description should be revised to incorporate the human subjects while still describing the main features of the public square.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This cityscape scenery shot captures a spacious public square under a dramatic, cloud-filled sky. A young boy in a blue shirt is seen running across the expansive, reddish-brown tiled plaza. At the heart of the square stands a tall, slender white monument with an ornate, golden, traditional-style top, surrounded by a decorative pool. The area features benches, green trees, including a prominent palm tree, and a few people sitting on motorcycles.
